plugins.name: LDAP/AD Authorization Plugin
plugins.description: Extends the bundled GoCD LDAP/AD Plugin to provide both authentication and authorization, allowing mapping of users from LDAP/AD groups to GoCD roles.

plugins.name: GitHub OAuth authorization plugin
plugins.description: The plugin allows user to login in GoCD using GitHub or GitHub Enterprise.

plugins.name: Google OAuth authorization plugin
plugins.description: The plugin allows user to login in GoCD using a Google account.

plugins.description: Allows users to login in GoCD using Google IAP headers

plugins.description: The plugin allows user to login in GoCD using an Okta account.

plugins.name: GitLab OAuth authorization plugin
plugins.description: The plugin allows user to login in GoCD using GitLab or GitLab Enterprise.

plugins.name: GoCD Guest Login Authentication plugin
plugins.description: The plugin allows user to login in GoCD as a guest user

plugins.name: Keycloak OAuth authorization plugin
plugins.description: The plugin allows user to login in GoCD using an Keycloak account.

plugins.description: A plugin to keep pipelines and environments configuration in source-control in Groovy.

plugins.name: gocd-jsonnet-config-plugin
plugins.description: A plugin to keep pipelines and environments configuration in source-control in Jsonnet.

plugins.description: Plugin to get build notifications on Slack.

plugins.description: Plugin that sends Riemann notifications on build status

plugins.description: Plugin to get build notifications on Cisco Spark.

plugins.name: MicroFocus  ALM Octane GoCD CI Plugin
plugins.description: This plugin integrates GoCD with MicroFocus ALM Octane, enabling ALM Octane to display GoCD pipelines, trigger pipeline runs, and track build and test run results, as well as committed changes.

plugins.name: Rocket.Chat Build Notifier
plugins.description: Notification plugin which sends build failures to RocketChat

plugins.name: GChat Notifier plugin
plugins.description: Sends GChat messages on specific pipeline stage state changes via webhook.

plugins.description: Plugin to poll a Yum repository (bundled prior to GoCD 23.1.0).

plugins.name: Maven repository poller

plugins.description: Plugin that watches sub-directories/sub-paths of Git repositories, better supporting monorepos.
